sourcesContent:
<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: "Proyecto", icon: "mdi-folder-outline" },
        { title: "Asesorias", icon: "mdi-account-plus-outline" },
      ],
      userId: localStorage.getItem("id"), // Retrieve the user's ID from localStorage
      project: {
        name: "",
        company: "",
      },
      file1: null,
      file2: null,
      file3: null,
      file1Uploaded: false,
      file2Uploaded: false,
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.fetchProject();
  },
  methods: {
    navigate(index) {
      switch (index) {
        case 0:
          this.$router.push("/student");
          break;
        case 1:
          this.$router.push("/student/asesorias");
          break;
        default:
          break;
      }
    },
    logout() {
      // Logic to logout the user
      localStorage.removeItem("token");
      localStorage.removeItem("user");
      // Redirect the user to the login page
      this.$router.push("/login");
    },
    fetchProject() {
      if (!this.userId) {
        console.error("No user ID found.");
        return;
      }

      axios
        .get(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}`)
        .then((response) => {
          const user = response.data;
          const projectId = user.project;

          if (!projectId) {
            console.error("No project ID found for the user.");
            return;
          }

          return axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/projects/${projectId}`);
        })
        .then((response) => {
          if (response) {
            this.project = response.data; // Save the project in this.project
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error("Error fetching project data:", error);
        });
    },
    clearFile(fileNumber) {
      switch (fileNumber) {
        case 1:
          this.file1 = null;
          this.file1Uploaded = false;
          break;
        case 2:
          this.file2 = null;
          this.file2Uploaded = false;
          break;
        case 3:
          this.file3 = null;
          break;
        default:
          break;
      }
    },
    submitFiles() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      formData.append("file1", this.file1);

      axios
        .post(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}/files`, formData, {
          headers: {
            "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data",
          },
        })
        .then((response) => {
          console.log("File 1 uploaded successfully:", response.data);
          this.file1Uploaded = true;
          // If file 1 is uploaded successfully, proceed to upload file 2
          if (this.file2) {
            this.uploadFile2();
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error("Error uploading file 1:", error);
        });
    },
    uploadFile2() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      formData.append("file2", this.file2);

      axios
        .post(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}/files`, formData, {
          headers: {
            "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data",
          },
        })
        .then((response) => {
          console.log("File 2 uploaded successfully:", response.data);
          this.file2Uploaded = true;
          // If file 2 is uploaded successfully, proceed to upload file 3
          if (this.file3) {
            this.uploadFile3();
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error("Error uploading file 2:", error);
        });
    },
    uploadFile3() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      formData.append("file3", this.file3);

      axios
        .post(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}/files`, formData, {
          headers: {
            "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data",
          },
        })
        .then((response) => {
          console.log("File 3 uploaded successfully:", response.data);
          // File 3 uploaded successfully
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error("Error uploading file 3:", error);
        });
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-btn i {
  color: white;
}
</style>
